SELECT * FROM EVENT WHERE 1 = 1
AND startDate LIKE '%${startDate}%'
SELECT E.evntNo, E.name, E.summary, E.poster, P.title, P.content, P.location FROM Event E JOIN EventProgram P ON(E.evntNo = P.evntNo) WHERE E.evntNo = #{evntNo}
SELECT ER.evntReviewNo, ER.evntNo, ER.Mno, ER.content, ER.rating, ER.writeTime, M.role, M.name FROM EventReview ER JOIN Member M ON ER.Mno = M.Mno WHERE ER.evntNo = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EventReview (evntReviewNo, evntNo, Mno, content, rating, writeTime) VALUES (#{evntReviewNo}, #{evntNo}, #{Mno}, #{content}, #{rating}, default)
mapper.select: SELECT ER.evntReviewNo, ER.evntNo, ER.Mno, ER.content, ER.rating, ER.writeTime, M.role, M.name FROM EventReview ER JOIN Member M ON ER.Mno = M.Mno WHERE ER.evntNo = #{evntNo}
